original: intros aP R Q a b H1 H2 H3 c Q1 HQ Hred. induction H3. - intros c' Q1' HQ' Hred'. inversion HQ' as [HQ_eq]. rewrite <- HQ_eq in Hred. apply red_cons with (Q := c' :: Q1). + auto. + apply Hred. - intros c' Q1' HQ' Hred'. inversion HQ' as [HQ_eq]. rewrite <- HQ_eq in Hred. apply redIn0b with (Q := Q1'). apply IHH3. * auto. * auto.
